body_content.explanation: something that has recently been added to something else:
examples: Their restaurant is a relatively new addition to the town's seaside eateries.
The ponies are the two newest additions to the wildlife park.
Every month, the channel sends out an email listing the newest additions to their weeknight TV lineup.

body_content.explanation: someone who has recently joined or been added to a group:
examples: She proved to be a very popular new addition to the team.
Even with the new additions, men still made up over 80 percent of senior judges.
The star was a new addition to the cast and quickly became a fan favorite.
Tabloids have been watching the princess's pregnancy closely and speculating about what new addition will mean for the royal family.
We're so excited about the newest addition to your family!
